column4: action, any idea on what to do next after rescatux has failed
i didnt think it was possible for a system to fail this deep
it seems like everything i have tried has failed miserably
not sure if you saw previous chat but my grub has been impossible to restore
i first got a grub error and attempted bootrepair and rescatux to restore but nothing worked
what happens when you expect the grub screen?
not the grub screen but when i boot from hdd after install i have a grub error
what is the error exactly?  does it halt your system and give you any message?
you have access to the filesystem with your boot/grub/grub.cfg ?
it is saying no such file or directory
are you on your grub command line for the non-booting system?
yes but right now i am booted off of the  rescatux live cd
like i said, im new to this so it would make sense to live cd ubuntu as we speak?
i'm looking at what rescatux can do.  I've never used it before.  If you use a command line 'df -h' command, what is the output?
